_header: I thought long while some lord come home
Title(s): A Welcome to the Lord Treasurer
_description: William Dunbar, A Welcome to the Lord Treasurer — eight quatrains with refrain: ‘Welcome my awin Lord Treasaurair’

CULLl510.First Lines:
I thocht lang quhill sum Lord come hamefra quhom faine kyndnes I
                    wald clame…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…And to ȝour seruand singulairWelcum my awin Lord
                    thesaurair
